vāsabhagāma： vāsabhagāma（pu）
ဝါသဘဂါမ（ပု）
«vāsabha+gāma»
[ဝါသဘ+ဂါမ]

Vāsabhagāma：A village in Kāsī．

It was once the residence of Kassapa Thera （Vin．i．312f）．

Beyond this village was another，called Cundatthila，between Vāsabhagāma and Benares．

Pv．iii．1； PvA．168，170．

A village in Uddhagāma，given by Mahānāga to the Jetavana vihāra．

Cv．xli．97．

vāsabhagāma：ဝါသဘဂါမ（ပု）
[ဝါသဘ+ဂါမ]
ဝါသဘရွာ၊ ဝါသဘမည်သောရွာ။
